name: Turret Merge
description:
Turret Merge is (supposed) to be a tower defense game with a unique twist. Place down turrets with their stats determined by their color and merge them together to create stronger turrets. Fight against tanks who want to destroy your defense system and reach your valuable diamond.   

Credits: 

Made for ScoreSpace Game Jam 14

Programming: Mootbing, BotMoooo

3D Modeling: BotMoooo

Music: Non existent (may be coming later)

SFX: Also non existent (probably coming later)

We were really under crunch time, so we weren't able to get a leaderboard system. However, we do intend on working on this project further and maybe releasing it on the AppStore.

Thanks to ScoreSpace for hosting the jam!
